    • Method Detail

      • clone

        public TaskImpl clone(Workload workload)
        Description copied from interface: Task
        Creates and returns a clone of current task.

        The clone should not rely on any of the current task's workload resources.

        The clone should be defined so that executing it will continue at the same point the current task was when the clone was created.
        However, if this is not possible, the clone should then restart the whole task from the beginning.

        Specified by:
        clone in interface Task
        Parameters:
        workload - the workload of the newly created clone
        Returns:
        the current task's clone

      • getWorkload

        public Workload getWorkload()
        Description copied from interface: Task
        Returns the task's workload. This value may not be available after discarding the task.
        Specified by:
        getWorkload in interface Task
        Returns:
        the task's workload
